des: "This makes good pork sandwiches when heated with 1 to 1 1/2 lbs of shredded cooked pork loin. I increase it about twelve times to make BBQ pork sandwiches for graduation open houses."
ins: Stir ketchup, brown sugar, Worcestershire sauce, honey, butter, mustard, lemon juice, chili powder, and garlic powder together in a saucepan over medium heat; simmer until hot, about 5 minutes.
